articles.author: David Ochoa, KUTV
articles.title: Utah family experiences Christmas Eve flight delays due to American Airlines malfunction - KUTV 2News
articles.description: While Santa gets to enjoy a delay-free flight, many others flying on Christmas Eve did not.
articles.content:
SALT LAKE CITY (KUTV) While Santa gets to enjoy a delay-free flight, many others flying on Christmas Eve did not.
American Airlines said a vendor tech malfunction caused some delays on many flights … [+1883 chars]
